entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 22. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries early this evening. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50. Low minus 22. Wind chill near minus 31. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Saturday 24 December 2022
